content: tissue tote original pattern by kathyrn a white katchkan materials thread sizes 10 thread color of choice 100 yrd size 10 contrasting color 25 yrds size 10 choice of color for flower 10 yrds size 10 green for leaves and stem 10 yrds hook size 7/ 1 65mm misc i small button gauge = 9 sts per inch 5 row per inch abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet treble_crochet = treble_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet dtr = treble_crochet cluster = cluster stitch p = picot st = stitch lp = loop skip = skip space = space decrease = together yo = wrap yarn over hook round = round decrease = decrease increase increase mc = main color cc = contrasting color repeat = repeat = repeat between as indicated * repeat from as indicated dbcs= double base chain stitch special stitches reverse single_crochet = when you have reached the end of the previous row do not turn working toward the beginning of the previous row insert hook in next st draw thread through and complete single_crochet as normal continue working across in this manner across may take a bit of practice to do this nicely but it makes a nice neat edge crossed double_crochet = skip 1 st double_crochet in next 1 double_crochet in skipped st tissue tote with main color chain 51 row 1 turn single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each st across row 2 chain 2 turn * skip 1 single_crochet double_crochet in next 1 double_crochet in skipped single_crochet * crossed double_crochet repeat form * to * across end with a double_crochet in last single_crochet row 3- 30 chain 2 turn * skip 1 double_crochet double_crochet in next 1 double_crochet in skipped double_crochet * repeat form * to * across end with a double_crochet in top of chain 2 turning chain of previous row row 31 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each st across end off weave end in 1 attach cc to first single_crochet of row row 1 1 single_crochet in each of the next 25 single_crochet chain 7 single_crochet in remaining single_crochet across row 2 do not turn work reverse single single_crochet crochet in each single_crochet arcoss to chain 7 lp 8 reverse single crochet in chain 7 lp continue across in reverse single_crochet to end of row end off weave end in attach cc to opposite end of piece row 1 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet across row 2 do not turn work reverse single single_crochet crochet in each single_crochet arcoss end off weave end in row 1 fold piece so the 2 finished edges meet in the middle attach cc thread to corner made by folding the piece be sure to go through both layers chain 1 single_crochet in same st working over both layers 2 single_crochet for each row of double_crochet across i ended up with 30 single_crochet across row 2 ch1 turn single_crochet in 1st single_crochet * chain 3 skip 2 single_crochet
